mods.abstract: A peasant village on the Nile River; a group of simpel mud and brick houses situated on the Nile River, several people mill about before the modest structures (fore and middle ground); copse of palm trees (background); "Edition Photoglob 5215. Environs de Bedouin" in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 28/655).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
